description: Damian West wonders why he even bothers sometimes. Sure, Noah & Josh will pretty much do whatever he says, but what good is it if he has to tell them what to do all the time? Before too long, all three guys are ready to blow a super sized load on the sofa, which they do, one after another, drenching the couch and reminding Damian of the meaning of teamwork.Enjoy!
title: Tight Ends
